00046 // Color defines
00047 #define GL_RGBA(r, g, b, a) (((unsigned long) (b)) + ((unsigned long) (g)) * 0x00000100UL \
00048    + ((unsigned long) (r)) * 0x00010000UL + ((unsigned long) (a)) * 0x01000000UL)
00049 #define GL_RGB(r, g, b) GL_RGBA(r, g, b, 0xFFUL)
00050 
00051 #define GL_TRANSPARENCY 0x00000000UL
00052 #define GL_BLACK 0xFF000000UL
00053 #define GL_BLUE 0xFF0000FFUL
00054 #define GL_GREEN 0xFF00FF00UL
00055 #define GL_CYAN 0xFF00FFFFUL
00056 #define GL_RED 0xFFFF0000UL
00057 #define GL_PURPLE 0xFFFF00FFUL
00058 #define GL_YELLOW 0xFFFFFF00UL
00059 #define GL_GRAY 0xFF808080UL
00060 #define GL_WHITE 0xFFFFFFFFUL
00061 
00062 #define GL_ALPHA_OF(color) ((unsigned char) ((((unsigned long) (color)) >> 24) & 0xFFUL))
00063 #define GL_RED_OF(color) ((unsigned char) ((((unsigned long) (color)) >> 16) & 0xFFUL))
00064 #define GL_GREEN_OF(color) ((unsigned char) ((((unsigned long) (color)) >> 8) & 0xFFUL))
00065 #define GL_BLUE_OF(color) ((unsigned char) (((unsigned long) (color)) & 0xFFUL))
00066 #define GL_COLOR_OF(color) (((unsigned long) (color)) & 0x00FFFFFFUL)
00067 
00068 #define GL_COLOR_A(color, a) (GL_COLOR_OF(color) + ((unsigned long) (a)) * 0x01000000UL)
00069 #define GL_BLACK_A(a) GL_COLOR_A(GL_BLACK, a)
00070 #define GL_WHITE_A(a) GL_COLOR_A(GL_WHITE, a)
00071 
00072 
00073 // Input event defines
00074 #define GL_KEYCODECOUNT 0x108
00075
